name: ascii::ascii_char::AsciiChar::as_str

slice::raw::from_ref.doc: Converts a reference to T into a slice of length 1 (without copying).

<[ascii::ascii_char::AsciiChar]>::as_str.doc: Views this slice of ASCII characters as a UTF-8 `str`.

doc: Views this ASCII character as a one-code-unit UTF-8 `str`.
